name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Result Age Limiter for Google Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set and save an age limit for search results. For example, always only display results of at most 1 year old.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing very old search results by default? With this extension you can set and save a setting for the maximum age of your search results.

Now every time you do a Google search, the age of the results is limited to your saved setting until you change it to something else.
